title: Ticket #4030: DAGMan manual is not clear which script args can't be used for PRE
description:
This is a little excerpt from the manual: 

  Eight variables ($JOB, $JOBID, $RETRY, $MAX_RETRIES, $RETURN,
$PRE_SCRIPT_RETURN, $DAG_STATUS and $FAILED_COUNT) can be used within the DAG input file as arguments passed to a PRE or POST script.

Not all of these can be used for PRE scripts -- that's mentioned down below where the variables are described, but this paragraph makes it seem like they can all be used in PRE scripts.
